title: The Big Downside of Your Kid Having a Smartphone
text: Get Christian parenting advice and help for raising children at Crosswalk.com. Biblical principles for Christian families and resources for new parents , and single parents . Find resources to help you raise your children according to the Bible and Jesus . On Crosswalk you will also find great resources on homeschool and Christian college . Parenting Kids and Children - Resources for Raising Christian Family The Big Downside of Your Kid Having a Smartphone
